revised_title: The Influence of Chloroform on Cardiac Rhythm and the Central Nervous System
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to understand the influence of the central nervous system on the cardiac rhythm and the effects of chloroform on that rhythm. They found that chloroform has a direct impact on the heart's intrinsic rhythm and that the reduction in pulse rate during chloroform anesthesia is partly due to the action of chloroform on the heart itself and partly due to the controlling influence of the vagus center in the medulla.
